about_the_game:
Take on the role of Clyde, a former detective who, after an assassination attempt, takes the path of a samurai. He wears a mask to hide his identity and thanks to this he infiltrates the gang of his nemesis.

Complete missions to eliminate rivals in the city to increase your prestige in the group. Investigate your last unfinished case.

Go through all the trials and finally restore justice. You are the best assassin in DreamCity. You are unshakable!

content_descriptors.notes: Blood flying out of enemies when damaged. Scenes of enemies dying. Separation of body parts.

detailed_description:
Take on the role of Clyde, a former detective who, after an assassination attempt, takes the path of a samurai. He wears a mask to hide his identity and thanks to this he infiltrates the gang of his nemesis.

Complete missions to eliminate rivals in the city to increase your prestige in the group. Investigate your last unfinished case.

Go through all the trials and finally restore justice. You are the best assassin in DreamCity. You are unshakable!
name: UNSHAKEN DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-530/ FX-4100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680/ HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take on the role of a former detective turned top contract killer. Complete missions destroying everyone who gets in your way in a challenging adventure!
